offer_title: Enjoy exclusive deals to make your celebrations even better with ComBank Credit and Debit Cards
offer_details_1:
The promotion is open for all Credit and Debit Cards issued by Commercial Bank of Ceylon PLC.
Offer valid for Sri Lankans and Expatriates only. 
All payments to be settled with the Commercial Bank Credit and Debit Cards only. 
This offer cannot be exchanged for cash or used in conjunction with other promotional programs or offers conducted by the Bank or the offer partner.
The General Credit and Debit Cards terms and conditions will continue to apply.
This offer is bound by the terms and conditions of the partnering merchant and Commercial Bank of Ceylon PLC.
Commercial Bank of Ceylon PLC reserve the right to change and/or modify all or any of the rules, terms and conditions applicable to this promotion at any given time with or  without prior notice to the Cardholders.
Commercial Bank of Ceylon PLC - Card Centre accepts no liability for the quality of goods or services provided by the offer partners in this promotion.
If any dispute arises regarding any of the terms & conditions contained herein, the decision of the Commercial Bank of Ceylon PLC - Card Centre shall be final.
